titleStmt.title: Robin Hood's rescuing Will Stutly, from the sheriff and his men, who had taken him prisoner, and were going for to hang him, &c. To the tune of, Robin Hood and Queen Catherine, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by and for W.O. for A.M., and sold by the booksellers of Pye-corner and London-bridge,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
